scenario.name: new_script
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "ИЭС факс автомат тест (SI3000 Style) " <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] Contact: sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 23456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=silenceSupp:off - - - - a=sendrecv

INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "ИЭС факс автомат тест (SI3000 Style) " <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>;[$remote_tag] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 23456 654322 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=silenceSupp:off - - - - a=sendrecv m=image [media_port] udptl t38 a=T38FaxRateManagement:transferredTCF a=sendrecv
ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] [last_CSeq:] Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "ИЭС факс автомат тест (SI3000 Style) " <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> [authentication] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
